Articles.Content:
**The new space cartels have began their black market commercial space trips. Cartels need their ship to be small/portable (easier to smuggle), cheap (for more profits), disposable (you can't recover anything), and have the kerbal land safely (for good yelp reviews).**

**The Challenge**

**Build the smallest and cheapest spaceship.**

**Easy, no?**

**Also, the ship must be launched from a "smuggling truck" in a secure location (behind the VAB)**

**Scoring**

**1000 pts. for orbit**

**500 pts. for Mun/Minmus flyby**

 **2500 pts. for Minmus landing/return**

**5000 pts. for Mun landing/return**

**4000 pts. for Duna/Eve/Dres flyby**

**4500 pts. for Moho/Jool flyby**

**500 pts. for Tylo/Vall/Laythe flyby**

**1000 pts. for Bop/Pol/Gilly Flyby**

**5000 pts. for Eleeo flyby**

**Landings on other planets/moons (unlikely) will also be given points, but I have nothing to scale them to yet.**

**(Score X Ã¢Ë†Å¡# of kerbals) / (Cost X 0.01 X Truck Volume)** 

**(Truck Volume Is Measured In Structural Panels ie. 2 x 2 x 5 = 20) (Ship Must Fit Entirely In Truck) (Cost Is Only The Ship, Not Truck)**

> [**Javascript is disabled. View full album**](//imgur.com/a/7pQnL)

**The Rules**

**No Debug menu**

**No Leaving/Entering Kerbin's Atmosphere in a Command Seat**

**No Mods**

**No Recovering Parts (Only Kerbals)**

**No Bug Exploitation**

**No Strategies**

**Anything Else That I Didn't Put on Here That Is Obviously Cheating**

**Score Board Will Be Added If/When Entries Arrive**

**Have Fun!**

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-18T12:46:07Z" title="04/18/2015 12:46  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 18, 2015</time> by gigaboom2**
